heading: Today
text: A mix of clouds and steamy sun. Showers and thunderstorms far north mid to late afternoon.

heading: Monday Night
text: Evening showers, thunderstorms, locally heavy rain, Adirondacks and Rt. 4 north, spotty south.

heading: Tuesday
text: Mostly cloudy, some sun far north. Chance of a few showers or thunderstorms, mainly south.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly sunny from the Green Mountains west, more clouds east, with scattered afternoon showers.
